channel.description: Recent content in podcast on Joseph Liu's Portfolio and Blog

item.title: The LJ-Left Creations Projects Podcast Episode 0
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: Hi, this is my prototype episode. Not published on podcast websites, until assured as suitable for publishing on podcast websites. Listen here or download Your browser does not support the audio element. Download Episode 0 The pre-episode to my projects in podcast form. It will explain what my projects are, what I did, and what would I do to improve, and any changes to the project from previous episodes. Enjoy it.

item.title: Music I Done and Setup
item.author: joeliu3rd@icloud.com (Joe Liu)
item.description: This is how I set up the microphone before I record my voice. For voice acting, singing, rapping or speaking. I made this out of a Samson USB Go Mic and a microphone cover. I first made this box out of acoustic foam attached to cardboard in February when I first made ‘Inspect’. And I bought a pop shield in front of the box to oppress spitting ‘p’ noise. I done this to minimise background when I sing.
